ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: depending on something else in the future in order to happen

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: In our government, these ministries and agencies are so insular and covetous of their turfs that they are unwilling to share information with others in the same government.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: wanting to have something too much, especially something that belongs to someone else

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: People need to recognize that a globe-trotting lifestyle has a terrible impact on the planet.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the act of travelling to a lot of different countries

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When confronted with the prospect of statewide legalization of recreational cannabis, the governor was typically mealy-mouthed.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: not brave enough to say what you mean directly and honestly

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He conducted a seat-of-the-pants campaign when he ran for mayoral elections.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: done using only your own experience and trusting your own judgment

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: I was surprised that someone so famous could be so self-deprecating in person.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: trying to make yourself, your abilities, or your achievements seem less important

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The Chief Justice has driven conservatives crazy with his habitual split-the-difference jurisprudence.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: to accept only part of what you originally wanted when making an agreement with someone, esp. an agreement involving money

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: As some other husbands are wont to do, he does not listen to his wife and keeps drinking every night.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: to often do something

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Egypt is still at odds with Ethiopia over a huge Nile River dam being proposed and built by the latter country.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: in disagreement

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: A boisterous soul, the main character is encumbered with hardly any of the standard norms of society.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: if a person or an organization is encumbered, there is something that makes it difficult for them to do things

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Learning a martial art is freighted with challenges, both physical and mental.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: loaded, burdened or charged (with something) a game freighted with significance and consequence for both teams

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The animals are ill-equipped to handle the increased heat and humidity.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: without the ability, qualities, or equipment to do something

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: After the pre-Christmas sale, the store was in shambles, and it took the staff hours to clean it up.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: state of disorder or confusion

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When the police attacked the protesters with tear gas, her daughter had been in the thick of it.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: in the most active or dangerous part of a particular situation or activity

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The stock market has been on a tear due to the announcement of looser monetary policy from the U.S Federal Reserve.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: having a period of success

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: We are putting the "Arts for the Elderly" program on hiatus until we can gather more funding.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a pause or break in continuity in a sequence or activity

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Along with the excellent food, there is always a wide variety of beer on tap at this pub.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: used to describe beer that is served from a barrel through a tap

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When he was a young, conservative critic on the make, a key moment in his career came when he met an editor with The Wall Street Journal.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: trying hard to succeed, esp. in a way that is dishonest

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Her surgery was a success, but she's not out of the woods yet. She needs to stay in intensive care.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: not having a problem or difficulty any longer

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: After a long-haul flight, your sleep schedule will be out of whack for a few days.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: not operating correctly or looking right

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: All these tail-chasing amendments to the new gun bill are a result of interference from the gun lobbies.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: to spend a lot of time and energy doing something, but achieving nothing

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He was a promising young instructor but could not come up to snuff, resulting in his dismissal.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: as good as it should be; of an acceptable standard

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The summer blockbuster is a well-trodden path to making money in Hollywood.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: used to refer to a set of actions that many people have done or a subject that many people have dealt with previously

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: This shop sells the kind of clothing that is de rigueur for skateboarders and surfers.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: demanded by fashion, custom, etc.

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When it comes to style in electric cars, the Tesla is still in a class by itself.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: excellent, or the best of its kind

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The U.S attorney general ought not to be in in cahoots with any politician, let alone the president.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: acting together with others for an illegal or dishonest purpose

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When John turned down the promotion, I knew I was in the catbird seat to get it.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: greater advantage

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: We are not sure if the candidate is on the level in promising income tax cuts.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: being honest or speaking truthfully

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: For a long time now, eBay has been under siege by people selling take brand-name products.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: If someone or something is under siege, they are being severely criticized or put under a great deal of pressure

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: As the company finalizes its plan to move to New York City, it has recently announced a flurry of new job ads in the area.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a sudden, short period of activity, excitement, or interest

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: After the first accusation of sexual assault, a slew of others followed.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a large amount or number

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The soup has a delightful light coconut flavor, with just a smidgen of ginger.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a small amount of

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When purchasing insurance, only a third of millennials said they wanted a bare-bones policy.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: used to describe an amount of money that is only just enough, or too little, for a particular purpose, or an arrangement that offers as little of something as possible

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: This honey is more expensive, but the taste is head and shoulders above the usual supermarket brands.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a lot better than

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The American movies made about Godzilla are starkly different from the much-loved Japanese classics.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: It can be used to describe a very noticeable difference between two things

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Between "Game of Thrones" and "The Sopranos," HBO has turned itself into the ne plus ultra of television networks.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the best or most excellent example of something

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Treatment in leukemia has changed over the last 18 months due to a bevy of new drugs that have received approval.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a large group of similar things or people

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: We provide a suite of software tools to help your business run more smoothly.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a group of things forming a unit or constituting a collection

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He was hired by Johnson to do a one-off delivery, but he soon became his personal chauffeur.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: something that happens or is made or done only once

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The magazine's more original editorial philosophy has lifted it above the ruck of most literary magazines.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the ruck : ordinary people or things, that you consider boring

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The fan club of the professional soccer team has chosen the moto "Ad Finem Fidelis", which means "Faithful to the End" in Latin.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: to the end

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: After the school shooting, schools around the country flew their flags at half-mast.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a flag that is at half mast has been brought down to a point halfway down the pole as an expression of sadness at someone's death

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: By a quirk of fate; her father and husband were both Japanese.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a strange and unexpected event

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: When the train stopped, we waited cheek by jowl for an hour until they fixed the fault.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: very close together

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: I switched to Bluetooth earbuds eons ago, but I see many people still use wired earbuds.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a period of time that is so long that it cannot be measured

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The police have made their biggest marijuana bust over the past several years, surpassing last year's total seizure of the drug in one swoop.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: If you do something at/in one fell swoop, you do it all at the same time

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He seems to have charisma in spades, and everyone likes him as soon as they meet him.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: in large amounts or to a very great degree

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: After a two-year search, they found their son living in squalor in downtown New York.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the condition of being extremely dirty and unpleasant, often because of lack of money

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The tiny startup was purchased lock, stock and barrel for 2 million dollars.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: including all or every part of something

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The football player has such as agility that he can stop on a dime to change direction.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: If a vehicle, etc. can turn, stop, etc. on a dime, it can turn, etc. in a very small space

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: His mother won't let him have sweets, but sometimes his grandmother takes him out for ice cream on the sly.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: secretly

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The employees were waiting with bated breath for their boss's year-end report.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: in an anxious (= worried and nervous) or excited way

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Interns often take on huge workloads without recompense just to improve their résumé.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: Given or available without charge or cost

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The bill was passed with nary an objection.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: not one or none at all; used for emphasis

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The real estate market shows no signs of slowing down, much to the dismay of first-time home buyers.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a feeling of shock and unhappiness

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Coal accounts for 70 percent of the state's electric power generation. To wit, it is one of the five states most heavily dependent on coal-fire power generation.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: used to make clearer or more particular something that you have already said

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Lions and tigers are carnivores.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: an animal that eats meat

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The king was regarded as having been an enlightened despot.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a person, especially a ruler, who has unlimited power over other people, and often uses it unfairly and cruelly

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The novel tells the story of the elopement of the narrator's mother.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the act of leaving home secretly in order to get married

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The ferocity of the attack shocked a lot of people.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the state of being frightening and violent

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Although he’s not given to hyperbole, Ron says we are light-years ahead of our time.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a way of speaking or writing that makes someone or something sound bigger, better, more, etc. than they are

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: None
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the worship or adoration of icons

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He felt a sense of incredulity, anger, and pain at the accusation made against him.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the feeling of not wanting or not being able to believe something

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He is listed as the greatest ever kleptocrat, alleged to have stolen up to $15 billion while in office.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a leader who makes himself or herself rich and powerful by stealing from the rest of the people

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: None
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the condition or quality of roundness or plumpness, as of an object or person

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Is the metaphor of a panopticon appropriate for voluntary surrender of privacy?
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a prison with cells (= rooms) arranged in a circle, so that the people in them can be seen at all times from the centre

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: His speech was distinguished by its perspicacity of thought and its felicity of phrase.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: the ability to understand things quickly and make accurate judgments

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: There has been an unwelcome recrudescence of racist attacks.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a sudden new appearance and growth, especially of something dangerous and unpleasant

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The deal propelled his business career into the stratosphere.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: an extremely high level of success

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Shostakovich was often seen as a political toady to Stalin.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a person who praises and is artificially pleasant to people in authority, usually in order to get some advantage from them

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: She can't stand heights and has always suffered from vertigo.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a feeling of spinning around and being unable to balance, often caused by looking down from a height

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: There was a short, derisive laugh.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: subject to or deserving of derision; ridiculous

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He was utterly dumbfounded.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: greatly astonished or amazed

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Some of these statements are misleading and some are downright mendacious.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: not telling the truth

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The painting depicts an idyllic pastoral scene of shepherds watching over their grazing sheep.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: (of a piece of art, writing, or music) having or representing the pleasant, traditional features of the countryside

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: The lorry was lodged in a very precarious way, with its front wheels hanging over the cliff.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: in a dangerous state because of not being safe or not being held in place firmly

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He was an tinhorn dictator.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: a person who talks and acts like someone who is strong and powerful but who is really weak

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: He is a veracious and trustworthy historian.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: honest and not telling or containing any lies

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: "Sometimes you make money; sometimes you don't; and sometimes you come out even," he muses.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: make the same score

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: Theologians list seven mortal sins.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: in the Roman Catholic religion, an action that is so bad that you will be punished for ever after your death if you do not ask God to forgive you

ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.example: They thought that the deadline was a tall order.
ﾌﾟﾚﾐｱﾑ2.definition: an unreasonable or difficult demand
